cac:TenderingProcess.cbc:Description: Services required are "light-touch services" falling within Annex XIV of Directive 2014/24/EU.

cac:ProcurementProject.cbc:Name: Regional Coordinators for the Creative Schools Initiative
cac:ProcurementProject.cbc:Description: The Arts Council wishes to contract individuals or organisations to deliver Regional Co-ordination Services for Creative Schools at the regions set out in section B of this CfT. A panel of regional coordinators will be formed to work across the country with each having oversight of a maximum of two regions. The primary tasks of the Regional Coordinators are: (i) Working closely with the Arts Council’s Creative Schools’ team, assist and coordinate the work of an assigned group of up to twenty-five Creative Associates. (ii) Support Creative Associates and teachers through the provision of professional development, networking, mentoring and support. (iii) Encourage and support schools and their representatives to engage with Creative Schools. Full details are set out on CfT uploaded with this tender competition

cac:SecurityClearanceTerm.cbc:Description: Subject to Garda vetting clearance through the National Vetting Bureau prior to contract
